version_description:
-Bugfixes
-Nachrichten: Verbesserte Anzeige des Namens und Online-Status des Chatpartners

-Bugfixes
-Local Channels work again
Bugfixes

Bugfixes

* Solved some issues, when trying to display images

Bugfixes
- Bugfixes

New registration and login
Bugfixes
Registration bug fixes
Changes for compliance with GDPR

- Changes for iPhone X
- New Splash Screen
- Changes in Messagebehaviour in order to prepare for the coming release of our new Messenger

- Facebook-Login not supported anymore
- Optimized the registration
- Better error messages
- General optimizations and bugfixes
- App does not crash anymore when uploading a new profile picture
Changed Imprint
Bugfixes
Bugfixes

Welcome to the new Knuddels iOS App.
- Finally, you can send pictures and moments
- Regular updates thanks to K3 technology
- Even easier to use
- Contemporary design
- Significant stability improvements

With the new iOS app, you get the best cuddle ever on an iPhone!

- Nicklist entries are displayed larger
- After the logout you start directly on the login page instead of the registration
- The James image was updated in the registry
- /f and /friends now opens the contact list
- Linked profiles are now opened
- /wc opens the channel selection
- Accept links to the friendship request works
- If you have deactivated visitors, you will no longer receive a notification badge
- /w now opens the own profile
- The links in the Fotomeet news work
- /changelog opens the changelog again
- /h opens the Knuddels Help Center
- Fixed potential crashes

You wish, we implement!

New in this version:
- /-commands have been checked for functionality and enabled
- Performance improvements when switching to the chat room
- Fixed potential crashes and improved the ability to detect crashes
- Matches are now displayed in the Messenger
- Fixes a bug where Stammis were asked to close Knuddels Plus when you wanted to click the visitors in the Messenger
- Fixes a bug where Knuddels Plus subscribers were asked to close Knuddels Plus when they clicked on visitors in the Messenger
- Fixed some crashes

Finally chatting in peace!
- You now have the possibility to leave chat rooms. You can also decide from now on whether you want to start in a chat room or not.

Every time a bit better
- We've been working to fix crashes and speed issues to improve your chat experience.

We have also fixed the following bugs in this version:
- The app no longer crashes when you write a message to yourself
- You can now again report members who do not have album pictures
- Advertising banners are only displayed with the correct size
- Calls no longer jump when messages are reloaded
- Fixed possible crash when opening conversations

- App starts where you stopped using it the last time
- Support for Keychain

- Fixed bug where the profile image wasn't updated correctly

New, improved contact management:
- Decide which contacts should be displayed
- See where and if your contacts are online
- Your contacts are now highlighted in the chat

Further improvements:
- Added the possibility to remove the own profile picture
- Multiple texts adjusted
- Minor problems fixed, e.g. when wrapping messages
- Improvements in the reliability of the simple login
- Fixed a problem in our registration process

In this version we have again some improvements and bugfixes for you. The following awaits you:
- The notifications of Fotomeet matches are no longer continuously displayed as unread in Messenger until you write with them.
- The visitor display in the Messenger now adapts to the new version for a better overview
- Improved display of blocked nicks, so that users can understand why they cannot write in any channel or news at the moment
- Nicknames can now be completed automatically

In this version we have again some improvements and bugfixes for you. The following awaits you:
- The notifications of Fotomeet matches are no longer continuously displayed as unread in Messenger until you write with them.
- The visitor display in the Messenger now adapts to the new version for a better overview
- Improved display of blocked nicks, so that users can understand why they cannot write in any channel or news at the moment
- Nicknames can now be completed automatically

In this version we have again some improvements and bugfixes for you. The following awaits you:
- The notifications of Fotomeet matches are no longer continuously displayed as unread in Messenger until you write with them.
- The visitor display in the Messenger now adapts to the new version for a better overview
- Improved display of blocked nicks, so that users can understand why they cannot write in any channel or news at the moment
- Nicknames can now be completed automatically

K3 v.4.21.1
- Problem where the interest in the quickwhois was set wrong for homosexual members was fixed
- Channel messages are always displayed in the correct order
- In the profile you can now enter the country and the postal code of your city
- We have integrated the contact filter, so you can now control who can write to you
- We have fixed other potential crashes
- For selected testers, v4.21.1 includes a first pre-alpha integration of system and user apps

We have fixed some bugs and problems for you in this version!
- We have fixed some crashes
- The last Online in display now works correctly
- It is now possible to complete Knuddels Plus even if you are not connected to a chatroom
- We have improved the security of your information by giving you the ability to choose exactly who you want to share your information with.

New in this version
- Now you can see how many cuddles you have
- Members of the user app test group can look forward to a major update of the user experience
- We have again fixed some crashes and minor bugs

New in this version
- Now you can see how many cuddles you have
- Members of the user app test group can look forward to a major update of the user experience
- We have again fixed some crashes and minor bugs

We have further improved the app for you:
- The app no longer closes directly when you put it in the background
- We have improved the icons of the profile entries
- /kiss and /knuddel are now shown with icon in the chat history
- We have revised the naming of the menu items
- We have further revised the presentation of user apps for our testers

- We have included several more chat games
- It is possible to buy Knuddel now
We fixed some bugs for you
We improved the user experience when games are displayed
We fixed some smaller bugs
- Wir haben unser Meldesystem deutlicher integriert, um unsere Mitglieder vor negativen Erfahrungen zu schützen

Wir haben für euch einige Verbesserungen vorgenommen:
- Ein Problem beim Versenden von Nachrichten wurde behoben
- Es gibt nun weitere Gesten und Animationen
- Unsere Jugendschutzmaßnahmen wurden weiter gestärkt
- MyChannel Betreiber können ihren Chatraum nun hervorheben
- Wir haben ein paar Texte angepasst
- Vorbereitung für Knuddel Happy Hours
